Extension Challenge¶

This extension is not an essential part of the experiment (unless your Instructor has told you otherwise); it allows you to demonstrate defences against this type of sidechannel (although usually they should be designed-in to the structure of the computatin rather than applied outside as a wrapper.).

Error Wrapping¶

Demonstrate a Python function which provides a password check by calling pwcheck(), but prevents your previous attack from succeeding.
